CustomField.description: If checked, this should check the Exclude from Billing checkbox on the child Timecard Splits, which has the same effect as Billing Hold, but is intended to reflect a permanent exclusion from Billing Generation.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If checked, this should check the Exclude from Billing checkbox on the child Timecard Splits, which has the same effect as Billing Hold, but is intended to reflect a permanent exclusion from Billing Generation.
CustomField.label: Exclude from Billing
